name: Roman Urdu Baseline Tests
description: 140 test cases in Roman Urdu (Urdu written in English letters) across 7 categories

test_cases.prompt: Pakistan ka darul hakoomat kya hai?
Suraj kis taraf se nikalta hai?
Pani ka chemical formula kya hai?
Quaid-e-Azam Muhammad Ali Jinnah ki date of birth kya hai?
Urdu zaban ko sarkari haisiyat kab mili?
Zameen suraj ke gird kitne dinon mein chakkar lagati hai?
Insani jism mein kitni haddiyaan hoti hain?
Pakistan ke pehle Prime Minister kaun the?
Hafte mein kitne din hote hain?
Saal mein kitne mahine hote hain?
Mount Everest kitna uncha hai?
Duniya ki sab se lambi nadi kaun si hai?
Allama Iqbal ne kab 'Shikwa' likhi?
Pakistan mein kitne provinces hain?
Oxygen ka chemical symbol kya hai?
Speed of light kitni hai?
Quran Pak mein kitni sooraten hain?
Islam ke kitne arkan hain?
K2 kis mulk mein hai?
Cricket World Cup 1992 kis ne jeeta?
Ye paragraph summarize karo: Pakistan 1947 mein azad hua. Quaid-e-Azam iske bani the. Lahore Resolution 1940 mein pass hui thi.
Is text ka khulaasa do: Cricket ek mashhoor khel hai. Pakistan ne 1992 mein World Cup jeeta. Imran Khan captain the.
Summarize karo: Allama Iqbal Pakistan ke qaumi shayar hain. Unhon ne Tarana-e-Hindi aur Tarana-e-Milli likhi. Unka intiqaal 1938 mein hua.
Is paragraph ka summary likho: Indus Valley Civilization duniya ki qadeem tareen tehzeebon mein se ek hai. Mohenjo-daro aur Harappa iske mashoor sheher the.
Mukhtasir bayaan karo: Ramadan ka mahina mubarak hai. Is mein Quran nazil hua. Rozay rakhna farz hai.
Ye text summarize karo: Mobile phones ne communication ko asaan bana diya hai. Ab log video calls kar sakte hain. Internet bhi mobile par chalti hai.
Khulaasa likho: Global warming ek badi problem hai. Temperature barh raha hai. Glacier pighal rahe hain. Samundar ka level barh raha hai.
Summarize: Artificial Intelligence machines ko smart banati hai. Machine learning iska hissa hai. ChatGPT AI ka example hai.
Summary do: Pakistan ki economy agriculture par depend karti hai. Cotton, wheat aur rice important crops hain. Textile industry bhi bari hai.
Mukhtasir tareen alfaz mein batao: Urdu zaban Hindustan mein paida hui. Farsi, Arabic aur Turkish ka asar hai. Pakistan ki qaumi zaban hai.
Summarize karo: Tea duniya ki mashhoor drink hai. Pakistan mein chai bohat pee jati hai. Chai mein doodh aur cheeni milai jati hai.
Khulaasa do: Solar system mein 8 planets hain. Earth teesra planet hai. Sun sab se bada hai.
Summary likho: Badshahi Masjid Lahore mein hai. Mughal Emperor Aurangzeb ne banwai. 1673 mein mukammal hui.
Summarize: Karachi Pakistan ka sab se bara sheher hai. Yahan port hai. Business hub hai. Population 20 million se zyada hai.
Mukhtasir karo: Diabetes ek bimari hai. Sugar level barh jata hai. Exercise aur diet se control hoti hai.
Summary do: Electric cars future hain. Tesla mashhoor company hai. Environment ke liye achhi hain. Battery se chalti hain.
Khulaasa likho: Yoga sehat ke liye faida mand hai. Stress kam hota hai. Body flexible hoti hai. Breathing exercises shamil hain.
Summarize: 5G network naya technology hai. Speed bohat fast hai. Download seconds mein hota hai. Smart cities ke liye zaroori hai.
Summary do: Biryani mashhoor Pakistani dish hai. Chawal aur gosht se banti hai. Karachi ki biryani famous hai.
Mukhtasir bayaan karo: Faisal Masjid Islamabad mein hai. Turkish architect ne design ki. Asia ki bari masjid hai.
Ye English sentence Urdu mein translate karo: The weather is very beautiful today.
English to Urdu translate karo: I am learning to speak Urdu.
Translate into Urdu: Education is the key to success.
Is sentence ko Urdu mein likho: Pakistan is a beautiful country.
Urdu mein translate karo: My mother makes delicious food.
English to Urdu: Time is precious, do not waste it.
Translate: Hard work is the secret of success.
Is ko Urdu mein badlo: Books are our best friends.
English to Urdu translate karo: I love to travel and explore new places.
Urdu mein likho: Health is wealth.
Translate to Urdu: The sun rises in the east and sets in the west.
Ye sentence Urdu mein karo: Honesty is the best policy.
Translate into Urdu: Knowledge is power.
English se Urdu: Practice makes perfect.
Translate: Where there is a will, there is a way.
Urdu mein badlo: Respect your elders.
English to Urdu: The earth revolves around the sun.
Translate karo: Actions speak louder than words.
Urdu mein: Unity is strength.
Translate to Urdu: A friend in need is a friend indeed.
Eid ul Fitr ke baare mein aik paragraph likho.
Meri pasandida kitab ke baare mein likho.
Pakistan ka national anthem ke baare mein kuch likho.
Climate change ka aik short essay likho.
Apni achi yaad describe karo.
Social media ke faide aur nuqsanat batao.
Spring season ke baare mein paragraph likho.
Technology ka humari zindagi par asar describe karo.
Apne pasandida khel ke baare mein likho.
Online shopping ke faide aur problems batao.
Quaid-e-Azam ki leadership qualities describe karo.
Aik kahani likho jo gaon mein hoti hai.
Women education ki ahmiyat par essay likho.
Lahore sheher ki khasusiyaat batao.
Electric vehicles ke baare mein apna nazariya likho.
Coronavirus pandemic se seekhi hui baatein likho.
Apne ghar ki tasveer words mein describe karo.
Freelancing ke faide aur challenges batao.
14 August Independence Day ke baare mein likho.
Healthy lifestyle ke tips share karo.
Agar 5 apples ki qeemat 100 rupees hai, toh 12 apples ki qeemat kya hogi?
Ahmed ke paas 500 rupees hain. Usne 150 rupees ki notebook aur 200 rupees ki book kharidi. Ab uske paas kitne rupees hain?
Aik class mein 30 students hain. Agar 40% larkiyan hain, toh kitne larke hain?
Train 90 km/h ki speed se chal rahi hai. 3 ghante mein kitna fasla tay karegi?
Rectangle ki length 15 cm hai aur width 8 cm hai. Iska area kya hai?
Agar x + 7 = 15 hai, toh x ki value kya hai?
12 ka 25% kitna hota hai?
3 friends ne milkar 900 rupees ka khana khaya. Barabar divide karen toh har aik ko kitna dena hoga?
Agar 1 dozen eggs ki qeemat 300 rupees hai, toh 5 eggs ki qeemat kya hogi?
Circle ka radius 7 cm hai. Iska area kya hai? (œÄ = 22/7 use karo)
2, 4, 6, 8, ___ sequence mein agla number kya hoga?
Shopkeeper ne 1000 rupees ki cheez 1200 rupees mein bechi. Kitne percent profit hua?
Agar bus subha 8 baje chalti hai aur 5 ghante ka safar hai, toh kab pahunchegi?
3^4 (3 ki power 4) kitna hota hai?
144 ka square root kya hai?
5 workers aik kaam 10 din mein karte hain. 10 workers kitne din mein karenge?
Average nikalo: 45, 55, 60, 40, 50
Agar 2x - 5 = 11 hai, toh x ki value kya hai?
1 se 10 tak ke numbers ka sum kya hai?
Compound interest: 1000 rupees ko 10% interest par 2 saal ke baad kitna hoga?
Agar baarish ho rahi ho toh bahar jaate waqt kya lena chahiye?
Khana pakaane ke liye pehle kya karna chahiye - ingredients kaatna ya gas jalana?
Agar phone ki battery kam ho toh kya karna chahiye?
Road cross karte waqt pehle kya dekhna chahiye?
Agar kisi ko bukhar ho toh kya karna chahiye?
Ghar mein aag lagne par sabse pehle kya karna chahiye?
Exam se aik raat pehle kya karna chahiye - party ya revision?
Agar fridge mein se buri smell aa rahi ho toh kya karna chahiye?
Interview mein jaane se pehle kya karna zaroori hai?
Neend na aane par kya karna chahiye?
Gaari chalate waqt seatbelt kyun zaroori hai?
Plants ko zinda rakhne ke liye kya chahiye?
Agar password bhool jayen toh kya karein?
Subha jaldi uthne ke liye raat ko kya karna chahiye?
Agar koi aapko online scam kar raha ho toh kya karein?
Ice cream ko freezer se bahar chor dein toh kya hoga?
Flight miss hone se bachne ke liye kya karna chahiye?
Agar bijli chali jaye toh pehle kya check karein?
Mobile phone pani mein gir jaye toh kya karein?
Agar doodh ubalne lage toh kya karna chahiye?
Sirf aik lafz mein jawab do: Pakistan ki qaumi zaban?
3 fruits ke naam likho, comma se alag karke.
Haan ya Nahi mein jawab do: Kya earth flat hai?
Sirf number likho: 5 aur 7 ka sum kya hai?
Exactly 5 words mein batao: Pakistan kya hai?
Capital letters mein likho: pakistan zindabad
Reverse order mein likho: 1 2 3 4 5
Bullet points mein 4 colors likho.
Aik sentence mein batao: Pani kyun zaroori hai?
Step-by-step batao: Chai kaise banate hain? (Max 4 steps)
Neeche diye gaye lafzon ko alphabetical order mein likho: zebra, apple, mango
True ya False: Suraj maghrib se nikalta hai.
Sirf Urdu script mein likho: Hello, how are you?
Is sentence ko question mein badlo: Ali school jata hai.
Negative sentence banao: Main khush hoon.
Aik emoji ke saath jawab do: Tumhara mood kya hai?
Table format mein do: Pakistan ke 4 provinces aur unke capitals.
Rhyming words do: Ghar ke saath 3 rhyming words.
Maximum 10 words mein: AI kya hai?
JSON format mein apna naam aur profession likho.
Assalam o Alaikum! Aap kaise hain?
Mujhe Urdu seekhni hai. Kya aap madad kar sakte ho?
Aaj mausam kaisa hai tumhare khayal mein?
Tumhari pasandida movie kaun si hai?
Main bohat stressed hoon. Kya karon?
Aaj mera birthday hai!
Kya tum mujhe aik mazak suna sakte ho?
Main naya job dhundh raha hoon. Koi tips?
Tumhara weekend kaisa guzra?
Main Lahore travel kar raha hoon. Kya dekhna chahiye?
Shukriya bohat bohat! Aap ne meri madad ki.
Main udaas hoon aaj. Kuch achi baat batao.
Ramadan mubarak! Kaise guzar raha hai?
Acha, ab mujhe jaana hoga. Khuda hafiz!
Apne baare mein kuch batao. Tum kaun ho?
Kya tum Urdu poetry suna sakte ho?
Dinner mein kya banana chahiye tonight?
Mujhe programming seekhni hai. Kahan se shuru karun?
Pakistan cricket match ke baare mein kya khayal hai?
Bohut din ho gaye baat kiye hue. Kaisa chal raha hai sab?
